trans-unit.source: Enables event tracking for a component.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute> type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute>型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute" /> class, enabling event tracking.
trans-unit.target: 啟用事件追蹤，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor enables event tracking.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式會啟用事件追蹤。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute>.
<see langword="true" /> to enable event tracking; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用事件追蹤，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute" /> class, optionally disabling event tracking.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性停用事件追蹤，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute>.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute.Value" /> property, which indicates whether tracking is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute.Value" /> 屬性的值，指出是否啟用追蹤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if tracking is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用追蹤，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the value of an `EventTrackingEnabled` attribute's <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會取得的值`EventTrackingEnabled`屬性的<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute.Value%2A>屬性。
